The Wolverines

The Wolverines

We are the spirit of Westview High School. We stand united, proud, and honored to represent the black and gold colors every day. We choose to uphold a sense of good sportsmanship among students and adults, and challenge ourselves to build better relationships between our classmates, community members and surrounding schools. We are focused on the development of our athletic abilities and enhancing our leadership skills. We are the WESTVIEW WOLVERINE BADMINTON TEAM!


2020 Tryouts:

Ticket to Play required for Tryout. No Ticket, No Play (No Exceptions)

Funding the Team

We are a new team that needs funds to support our expenses related to travel, tournament fees, team spirit wear, and genaral expenses. Since, we are not being funded by the athletics department, we highly appreciate your support. Please donate tot the team.
